title: Women's Sports News: World Cup, WNBA, Reigning Triathlete
teaser: The U.S. beat China Friday night in the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup. And the WNBA season is heating up. NPR's Scott Simon and NPR's sports correspondent Tom Goldman talk women's sports.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
